name: api_physics2d_Texture2D
description: Class that represents textures in C# code.

properties.name: activeMipmapLimit
properties.description: The number of high resolution mipmap levels from the texture that Unity doesn't upload to the GPU. (Read Only)

properties.name: alphaIsTransparency
properties.description: Indicates whether this texture was imported with TextureImporter.alphaIsTransparency enabled. This setting is available only in the Editor scripts. Note that changing this setting will have no effect; it must be enabled in TextureImporter instead.

properties.name: calculatedMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level calculated by the streaming system, which takes into account the streaming Cameras and the location of the objects containing this Texture. This is unaffected by requestedMipmapLevel or minimumMipmapLevel.

properties.name: desiredMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that the streaming system would load before memory budgets are applied.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The format of the pixel data in the texture (Read Only).

properties.name: ignoreMipmapLimit
properties.description: This property causes a texture to ignore all texture mipmap limit settings.

properties.name: loadedMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that is currently loaded by the streaming system.

properties.name: loadingMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that the mipmap streaming system is in the process of loading.

properties.name: minimumMipmapLevel
properties.description: Restricts the mipmap streaming system to a minimum mip level for this Texture.

properties.name: mipmapLimitGroup
properties.description: The name of the texture mipmap limit group that this texture is associated with. (Read Only)

properties.name: requestedMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level to load.

properties.name: streamingMipmaps
properties.description: Determines whether mipmap streaming is enabled for this Texture.

properties.name: streamingMipmapsPriority
properties.description: Sets the relative priority for this Texture when reducing memory size to fit within the memory budget.

properties.name: vtOnly
properties.description: Returns true if the VTOnly checkbox was checked when the texture was imported; otherwise returns false. For additional information, see TextureImporter.vtOnly.

properties.name: Texture2D
properties.description: Create a new empty texture.

properties.name: Apply
properties.description: Copies changes you've made in a CPU texture to the GPU.

properties.name: ClearMinimumMipmapLevel
properties.description: Resets the minimumMipmapLevel field.

properties.name: ClearRequestedMipmapLevel
properties.description: Resets the requestedMipmapLevel field.

properties.name: Compress
properties.description: Compress texture at runtime to DXT/BCn or ETC formats.

properties.name: CopyPixels
properties.description: Copies pixel data from another texture on the CPU.
